fr.cnrs.iees.tree

Interface TreeNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Identifiable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataTreeNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataTreeNodeImpl, SimpleTreeNodeImpl

    public interface TreeNode
extends Identifiable, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    A Node member of a tree graph. Introduces the concepts of parents and children.
    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 4 d√©c. 2018

    • Method Detail

      • getParent

        TreeNode getParent()
        Gets the parent node. Returns null if this is the tree root.
        Returns:
        the parent of this node

      • setParent

        void setParent(TreeNode parent)
        Set the argument as this node's parent. CAUTION: no consistency checks! this is the tree's job.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node

      • getChildren

        java.lang.Iterable<TreeNode> getChildren()
        Gets the children nodes.
        Returns:
        the list of children nodes.

      • addChild

        void addChild(TreeNode child)
        Adds a node as a child. CAUTION: no consistency checks! this is the tree's job.
        Parameters:
        child - the node to add

      • setChildren

        void setChildren(TreeNode... children)
        Adds a set of nodes as children
        Parameters:
        children - the nodes to add

      • hasChild

        default boolean hasChild(TreeNode child)
        Checks that a child is in a node. NOT efficient - should be overloaded in descendants
        Parameters:
        child - the child to check
        Returns:
        true if the child was found;
